entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
